CHAT.comment: the start of the session mother is sitting on the floor and June is sitting on her knee. they are looking at a book.

u.a: June reaches out and turns the page .
the book is a folding book and June has become tangled in it .
June pushes the book on to the floor
June turns the page , it's the last one in the book
June waves her fingers to indicate turning the page .
initial sound may be an unaspirated p@l
June has become interested in the folding book again , once again she has become entangled in it .
mother points to the next picture .
mother points to the next page .
mother points to the next page .
mother points to the other page .
June picks up a different book
June drops the book and picks it up again
points to a picture in the new book
points to a picture in the book
June hands the book to her mother .
mother takes the book and begins to read .
June is looking at the book .
silence , June looks at the front of the book .
silence , mother picks up a building block
mother begins to stack the blocks in towers .
silence during which mother makes towers and June knocks them down again .
June spots the folding seashore book and picks it up .
June hands a cookie to her mother , while her mother holds it , June bites it .
silence , June picks up a toy rabbit
silence , June is sitting on her tricycle , her mother has a book .
mother shows the picture to June .
mother turns the page so June can see the sheep .
June is sitting on her tricycle , she pushes herself along .
silence , June gets off the trike and walks to mother
silence , mother picks up the shapesorter and gives it to June
mother picks up a shape and tries to get it into a hole .
June reaches out towards the shapesorter .
June looks to her mother for help .
no response , June succeeds with the shape , mother pushes it through the hole .
June tries to put another shape through the same hole .
mother rotates the shapesorter looking for the correct hole .
silence during which June tries unsuccessfully to get a shape through a hole .
mother puts her finger through the correct hole .
mother puts her finger through a hole .
mother picks up a new shape .
silence during which June turns the shapesorter .
mother takes the box and opens it .
June picks up the box and tips the shapes out .
June is still holding the empty box , silence
silence during which mother drops in a shape . June attempts to tip the shape out , then she lifts it out and dumps it .
June puts the shapesorter on her head .
June attempts to put the hat on her mother's head .
mother takes the shapesorter and puts it on her own head .
mother puts the shapesorter on June's head .
the shapesorter falls with a mighty crash and its lid falls off , June attempts to put the lid back on .
June holds the lid up to Roy .
June is still trying to put the lid back on .
silence , June decides to put a shape through a hole without putting the lid back . she isn't successful .
the theta is very breathy , almost an h .
June puts the shape through a hole .
June drops another shape into the shapesorter .
June has another attempt at putting the lid back on .
silence , June continues to drop shapes into the lidless shapesorter .
June puts most of the shapes into the shapesorter and then attempts to put the lid on again .
June picks up a shape and tries to get it through a hole .
mother picks up a shape that matches the hole .
mother pokes her finger through the correct hole .
June hands the shape to her mother .
then she takes it back from her mother .
silence , mother puts the lid back on the shapesorter
June decides to "help" with the restoration , the shapesorter slips and hits June .
mother pushes a shape through a hole . silence .
June pushes the shape back out of the hole again .
June hands a shape to her mother . silence .
mother hands it back and June attempts to put it on her own head .
June is now facing the camera . she turns back away from it .
June grabs hold of her mother's pendant .
June gets hold of mother's hair .
June attempts to put the overshoe on and then sees the book she had earlier .
mother picks up the book and turns the page .
June sticks her foot in the air , the overshoe is now on her foot . silence .
June drops a shape into the shapesorter .
silence during which June drops another shape into the shapesorter . then she tips them all out again .
June puts her hand through a hole .
silence , mother picks up a shape and drops it into the shapesorter .
June tries unsuccessfully , mother tries to get her to put in a different one .
her mother attempts to put a shape in the shapesorter but June moves it away .
silence , June begins to play with some colored ribbons attached to her trike .
June goes back to the shapesorter , mother tries to help .
June picks up her toy bunny and also tries without success to put a shape through a hole .
June is making bilabial trills - engine noises ? .
June puts the toy on her trike and makes more bilabial trills .
falling off . June keeps on putting the rabbit on the trike but the toy keeps
silence , June picks up a plastic glove puppet .
June begins to play with the stacking blocks .
silence , June hands shapes to her mother one by one .
mother picks up the stacking blocks cart and puts it in front of June .
mother puts a block on the cart .
June tips the block off the cart .
mother puts the block on the floor and begins to build a tower .
silence during which mother builds a tower and June watches the cart . June turns and looks at her mother's tower .
gives the cart to mother silence during which June leans over , picks up a spare block and puts it on the cart , then she gazes at the cart intently .
June cries again and takes the cart back from her mother , mother puts the duck on the cart .
mother produces an old bunch of keys from the toybox . June swings the cart around , silence
June is tangled in the shapesorter lid .
silence , June is looking at the keys .
silence during which child looks at the camera , still holding the keys . mother gets the toy ladybug out of the toybox and pushes it across the floor .
June gets a toy kitten out of the toybox .
June is playing with the toy .
June puts down the kitten and picks up the bug .
June walks around holding the bug and goes behind a chair .
mother goes over to the chair .
mother picks up June and carries her back to the center of the room .
June disappears behind the chair again .
mother goes and brings June out again .

the doll looks like a wolf , when it's turned around and the bonnet is pushed back , it looks like an old lady , and when it's turned upside down and it's skirt is adjusted it looks like a little girl . it currently looks like a wolf .
mother holds up a doll in front of June .
June disappears behind the chair again , mother retrieves her again .
mother brings her back , June attempts to hide again but is prevented from doing so by her mother . June cries . mother drops a blanket over her .
mother lifts the blanket off June .
mother begins to bounce a tennis ball on the floor .
mother is playing with the ball , then she moves June further away from the camera .
June is crawling on the floor .
June picks up the train book .
mother walks over towards June and then sits on the floor .
mother taps the floor in front of herself .
silence during which mother lifts June over to her .
points to the book as she reads
June is wriggling on her mother's knee , she slips off .
mother picks up a toy train .
June sees a cloth book in the toybox .
mother gives her the cloth book
points to a picture in the book
silence during which June is sitting and looking at the book .
silence during which June is playing with the book .
